CustomField.formula: IF( Walk_In_Attendee__c, "Walk-In", IF( Tickets_in_order__c = 0, "", IF( Remaining_Tickets__c = 0, "Cancelled", "Booked" ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Determines the status of the booking: If the attendee is a walk-in, it shows 'Walk-In'. If no tickets were ordered, it stays blank. If tickets were ordered but none remain, it shows 'Cancelled'. If tickets were ordered and at least one remains, it shows 'Booked'.
CustomField.label: Booking Status
